metadata.title: CVE-2019-15592 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GitLab 12.2.2 and below contains a security vulnerability that allows aguest user in a private project to see the merge request ID associated toan issue via the activity timeline.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
